channel.title: Music on Dustan Kasten
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Dustan Kasten

item.title: If You Were a Tree EP
item.description: Today is the day. My first music release has finally started hitting the streaming shelves. These songs are not new songs, but for my music creating journey are important. Seas is the first song I wrote and I’ve continued to play it and enjoy it for the past 6 years. Self help is the most recently completed song. Give them a stream and let me know if you’d like to hear more.
